title: Site-69模板基底
content:
>[!-{$-}
[[div class="code"]]
使用介绍： (for croquembouche only. this isn't a component page)

Omit  rooms with default text

One line of text means default-like text, i.e. descriptive only, no events. If there's more than one line, there are events

@@[[include :scp-sandbox-3:site-fine:footage-template@@
| dead-personnel = space-separated numbers
| pantry =
| storage =
| foyer =
| hangar =
| server =
| cafe =
| d1 =
| d2 =
| d3 =
| d4 =
| d5 =
| d6 =
| armoury =
| bay =
| containment =
| airlock =
| a4 =
| a3 =
| a1 =
| office-corridor =
| server-corridor =
| d-corridor =
| ring-north =
| ring-east =
| ring-south =
| ring-west =
| armoury-corridor =
| outside =
@@]]@@
[[/div]]
[!-- --]

[[div class="dead-personnel-manifest {$dead-personnel}" style="display:none"]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="footage__display footage__display--hangar"]]
++ 机库

[[div_ class="footage__feed"]]
[[span class="room-icon room-icon--cctv"]]CCTV[[/span]] CCTV可用
[[/div]]

[[div class="footage__display-start"]]
[[/div]]

{$hangar}

[[div class="footage__display-end"]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]


[[div class="footage__display footage__display--server"]]
++ 服务器室

[[div_ class="footage__feed"]]
[[span class="room-icon room-icon--cctv"]]CCTV[[/span]] CCTV可用
